RelatedSentence: For example , a recent study by researchers at the University of Michigan found that patients on Medicaid had two - thirds more complications and were more than twice as likely to die in the month after their operations compared with those on private insurance .

For example , a recent study by researchers at the University of Michigan found that patients on Medicaid had two - thirds more complications and were more than twice as likely to die in the month after their operations compared with those on private insurance .

The study , to be published this month in the journal JAMA Surgery , found that Medicaid patients stayed an average of three days in the hospital rather than two with privately - insured patients and were more likely to return to the hospital after going home from surgery .
And Medicaid patients had more emergency operations and used 50 percent more hospital resources than patients with other kinds of insurance .
